body:
Hey, just thought I'd start up a new little series for the community members. :> This has been tried before by somebody else but it died off. Oh yeah, and this is unofficial. Anyways, say hello to Cyclops! :)

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My username is Cyclops, and my favorite game on Avicus is Nebula (specifically CTW).

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
I'm an 11th grade student starting this September. I don't enjoy much sports (except esports :^) ), but if I had to pick, it would be Tennis. I greatly enjoy computer programming, but I'm looking into 3D Graphic Design as a career. I've been on the server since mid mczone times, and I've greatly enjoyed the time I've spent here, and I still do, although it can get boring time to time now. I lead the Team named "Zac's Crew", also known as "Team Allah", "Immunity" and "Sophisticated Robots" from way back then heh. The team has been going for a solid 3 years it looks like.

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
Anime.

What interests you the most in life?
Technology.

​What music/art/media do you like?
 I get into a lot of EDM, especially from artist such as Two Friends, and my classic weeb edm brought to you by Trifect (<<<< check him out on soundcloud).

​Where are you from?
I live in Fort Lee, NJ. My family is pure Peruvian though.

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
Playing a lot of the competitive sides of things, such as tournaments and scrimmages.

​Anything else you want to mention?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WQ5iiAQuaiQ Click at your own risk.

title: Community Spotlight #1 - Cyclops

replies.body: I'm Rick Harrison, and this is my pawn shop. I work here with my old man and my son, Big Hoss. Everything in here has a story and a price. One thing I've learned after 21 years - you never know WHAT is gonna come through that door.

replies.body: ummm this is unrelated  but umm im trying to make a ban appeal aka appeal an infraction but when i go to the page nothing comes up... can anyone help?!
replies.body_tagged: ummm this is unrelated  but umm im trying to make a ban appeal aka appeal an infraction but when i go to the page nothing comes up... can anyone help?!

replies.body: Go to 'Appeal an Infraction' and make a new thread, the button is located up at the top on the black banner. In the future, please refrain from making posts like these on random threads and instead contact a senior moderator elsewhere.
replies.body_tagged: Go to 'Appeal an Infraction' and make a new thread, the button is located up at the top on the black banner. In the future, please refrain from making posts like these on random threads and instead contact a senior moderator elsewhere.
